name: shoot black
description:
It's been a while since I've made a game.
How to play:

Use the WASD or arrow keys to move 

To shoot left or right click and aim using your mouse

If you hold the space bar it will make you sprint

press E to start

This is a endless shooter so just keep playing
Plans:

I plan to make a shop with the coins you get from killing enemies and I hope to add new guns to buy and health packs when health is added(it's not you're basically unkillable)
